channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Datahook: Helena

item.title: Chatbot: Helena's resume
item.description: My skills and experience chatbot - ask anything!

item.title: Quantium Virtual Internship
item.description: Here we will go through a supermarket transaction data to understand better our customer segments and their purchasing behaviors. The data and task is from a data analytics virtual work experience program I completed with Forage and Quantium, a leading data science and AI Firm with a track record of innovation in data science.

item.title: ANZ Virtual Internship
item.description: This is a post about a virtual work experience program I completed with Forage in their collaboration with ANZ, an Australian multinational banking and financial services company.

item.title: Increasing profit in a five star luxury environment
item.description: This is a solution I proposed for a data based problem while working in a successful five star luxury hotel cocktail bar.

item.title: Predicting Catalog Demand - with scikit-learn
item.description:
Continuation of Udacity project

This time we will go through this project with Python using scikit-learn and see how the results differ from eachother from previous iteration.
Weâ€™re tasked with predicting how much money a fictional company in the mail-order catalog business can expect to earn from sending out a catalog to new customers.

item.title: Predicting Default Risk
item.description: In this project, we need to decide if a new bank customer is approved for loan or not using a predictive model.

item.title: Predicting Catalog Demand
item.description: In this project, we will analyze a fictional business problem in the mail-order catalog business. We’re tasked with predicting how much money your company can expect to earn from sending out a catalog to new customers.
